GridUserPreferences.gridOptionsJsString: { "columnDefs": [{ "headerName": "Invoice Id", "field": "invoiceId", "sortable": true, "filter": "agTextColumnFilter", "lockPosition": true, "filter": true,"floatingFilter": true,"minWidth": 200, "headerCheckboxSelection": true, "checkboxSelection": true, "cellRenderer": function (params) { return '' + params.data.invoiceId + '' } },{ "headerName": "External Id", "field": "externalId", "sortable": true, "minWidth": 100, "filter": "agTextColumnFilter" },{ "headerName": "Invoice Sequence", "field": "invoiceSequence", "sortable": true, "minWidth": 100, "filter": true,"floatingFilter": true,"filter": "agTextColumnFilter" }, { "headerName": "Invoice Type", "field": "invoiceType", "sortable": true, "minWidth": 200, "filter": true,"floatingFilter": true,"filter": "agTextColumnFilter" },{ "headerName": "Invoice Ext Ref Number", "field": "invoiceExtRefNumber", "sortable": false, "minWidth": 200, "filter": true,"floatingFilter": true,"filter": "agTextColumnFilter" }, { "headerName": "Invoice Date", "field": "invoiceDate", "sortable": true, "cellRenderer": function (data) { var value = data.value; if (value instanceof Date && !isNaN(value)) return data.value ? (new Date(data.value)).toLocaleDateString() : ''; else return data.value ? data.value : ''; }, "comparator": function dateFieldComparator(date1, date2) { var date1Number = date1 && new Date(date1).getTime(); var date2Number = date2 && new Date(date2).getTime(); if (date1Number == null && date2Number == null) { return 0; } if (date1Number == null) { return -1; } else if (date2Number == null) { return 1; } return date1Number - date2Number; } }, { "headerName": "Status", "field": "statusId", "sortable": true, "minWidth": 200,"filter": true,"floatingFilter": true, "filter": "agTextColumnFilter" }, { "headerName": "Customer Id", "field": "billToPartyId", "sortable": true, "minWidth": 200, "filter": true,"floatingFilter": true,"filter": "agTextColumnFilter" }, { "headerName": "Customer name", "field": "billToPartyName", "sortable": true,"filter": true,"floatingFilter": true, "minWidth": 200, "filter": "agTextColumnFilter" },{ "headerName": "Customer Ref", "field": "billToPartyRefId", "sortable": true, "minWidth": 200, "filter": true,"floatingFilter": true,"filter": "agTextColumnFilter" }, { "headerName": "Total Sales Amount", "field": "totalSalesAmount", "sortable": true, "minWidth": 200, "filter": "agTextColumnFilter" }, { "headerName": "Lot Detail", "field": "skuDescription", "sortable": true,"filter": true,"floatingFilter": true, "minWidth": 100, "filter": "agTextColumnFilter", "cellRenderer": function(params) { let skuDescription = params.data.skuDescription; let value = skuDescription; if (skuDescription && skuDescription.length > 20) { value = skuDescription.substring(0, 20) + '...'; } return value; } }, { "headerName": "Margin Cost", "field": "marginCost", "sortable": false, "minWidth": 100, "filter": true,"floatingFilter": true,"filter": "agTextColumnFilter" }, { "headerName": "Unit Retail", "field": "unitRetail", "sortable": true, "filter": true,"floatingFilter": true,"minWidth": 100, "filter": "agTextColumnFilter", "cellStyle": { 'text-align': 'right' } },{ "headerName": "Unit Cost", "field": "unitCost", "sortable": true, "minWidth": 100, "filter": true,"floatingFilter": true,"filter": "agTextColumnFilter", "cellStyle": { 'text-align': 'right' } },{ "headerName": "Quantity Sold", "field": "quantitySold", "sortable": true, "minWidth": 100,"filter": true,"floatingFilter": true, "filter": "agTextColumnFilter", "cellStyle": { 'text-align': 'right' } }, { "headerName": "Extended Discount", "field": "extendedDiscount", "sortable": true,"filter": true,"floatingFilter": true, "minWidth": 100, "filter": "agTextColumnFilter", "cellStyle": { 'text-align': 'right' } }, { "headerName": "View Invoice", "filter": true,"floatingFilter": true,"sortable": false, "minWidth": 100, "filter": false, cellRenderer: function(params) { if (params.data.transactionNumber!= null) { return '' } else { return '';
